verses.text: \w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w* \w was|strong="H4428"\w* \w told|strong="H0559"\w* \w Joab|strong="H0559"\w*, \w that|strong="H0559"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w wept|strong="H1058"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w mourned|strong="H1058"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*:

\w And|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* victory \w that|strong="H2009"\w* day \w was|strong="H4428"\w* turned \w into|strong="H5921"\w* \w mourning|strong="H0056"\w* unto \w all|strong="H2009"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* people: \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* people \w heard|strong="H5046"\w* say \w that|strong="H2009"\w* day: \w The|strong="H5921"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* grieveth \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* son.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* shunned \w the|strong="H3605"\w* going \w into|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w city|strong="H1931"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w as|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w would|strong="H0559"\w* \w do|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* hath \w turned|strong="H1961"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* backs, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* fled \w away|strong="H3605"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w battle|strong="H3117"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* king covered \w his|strong="H0834"\w* head, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* cried \w with|strong="H0935"\w* \w a|strong="H0935"\w* loud voice: O \w my|strong="H0834"\w* son Absalom, O Absalom \w my|strong="H0834"\w* son, O \w my|strong="H0834"\w* son.

\w Then|strong="H0853"\w* Joab going into \w the|strong="H0853"\w* house \w to|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, said: Thou hast shamed this day \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w faces|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w all|strong="H1419"\w* thy servants, \w that|strong="H1121"\w* \w have|strong="H1121"\w* saved thy life, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* lives \w of|strong="H1121"\w* thy \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* thy daughters, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* lives \w of|strong="H1121"\w* thy wives, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* lives \w of|strong="H1121"\w* thy concubines.

Thou lovest \w them|strong="H0413"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* hate thee, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* thou hatest \w them|strong="H0413"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* love thee: \w and|strong="H1121"\w* thou hast shewn \w this|strong="H3117"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* thou carest \w not|strong="H5315"\w* \w for|strong="H0413"\w* thy nobles, \w nor|strong="H0413"\w* \w for|strong="H0413"\w* thy \w servants|strong="H5650"\w*: \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w now|strong="H3117"\w* \w plainly|strong="H0559"\w* perceive \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w if|strong="H1121"\w* Absalom \w had|strong="H4428"\w* \w lived|strong="H5315"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w we|strong="H3117"\w* \w had|strong="H4428"\w* \w been|strong="H3605"\w* slain, \w then|strong="H0853"\w* \w it|strong="H6440"\w* \w would|strong="H0559"\w* \w have|strong="H1121"\w* pleased thee.

\w Now|strong="H3117"\w* \w therefore|strong="H3045"\w* arise, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* go \w out|strong="H3045"\w*, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* speak \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* satisfaction \w of|strong="H3117"\w* thy \w servants|strong="H5650"\w*: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w swear|strong="H3588"\w* \w to|strong="H4191"\w* thee \w by|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* Lord, \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w if|strong="H3588"\w* thou wilt \w not|strong="H0369"\w* go \w forth|strong="H3045"\w*, \w there|strong="H0369"\w* \w will|strong="H5869"\w* \w not|strong="H0369"\w* tarry \w with|strong="H3045"\w* thee \w so|strong="H4191"\w* \w much|strong="H3605"\w* \w as|strong="H3117"\w* \w one|strong="H0369"\w* \w this|strong="H3588"\w* night: \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H5869"\w* \w be|strong="H4191"\w* worse \w to|strong="H4191"\w* thee, \w than|strong="H3605"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* evils \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H0369"\w* befallen thee \w from|strong="H3117"\w* thy youth until \w now|strong="H3117"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H6965"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w king|strong="H5921"\w* \w arose|strong="H6965"\w* \w and|strong="H0935"\w* sat \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* gate: \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w it|strong="H0518"\w* \w was|strong="H0369"\w* \w told|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H0376"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w king|strong="H5921"\w* sat \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* gate: \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H0376"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w* \w before|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w king|strong="H5921"\w*, \w but|strong="H3588"\w* Israel fled \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w own|strong="H0376"\w* dwellings.

\w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w were|strong="H3478"\w* \w at|strong="H3427"\w* strife \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* tribes \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*: \w The|strong="H3605"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* delivered \w us|strong="H5046"\w* \w out|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* hand \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w our|strong="H3605"\w* \w enemies|strong="H6965"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w he|strong="H0376"\w* saved \w us|strong="H5046"\w* \w out|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* hand \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* Philistines: \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w now|strong="H2009"\w* \w he|strong="H0376"\w* \w is|strong="H0376"\w* \w fled|strong="H5127"\w* \w out|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w land|strong="H6440"\w* \w for|strong="H3605"\w* Absalom.

\w But|strong="H1961"\w* \w Absalom|strong="H0053"\w*, whom \w we|strong="H6258"\w* anointed \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w us|strong="H5921"\w*, \w is|strong="H1931"\w* dead \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* battle: \w how|strong="H0341"\w* long \w are|strong="H3478"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w* silent, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w bring|strong="H1961"\w* \w not|strong="H1961"\w* back \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*?

\w And|strong="H4428"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* David \w sent|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H4191"\w* Sadoc, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* Abiathar \w the|strong="H0853"\w* priests, saying: Speak \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* ancients \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Juda, saying: \w Why|strong="H4100"\w* \w are|strong="H0834"\w* \w you|strong="H0859"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* last \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w bring|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w back|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* house? (\w For|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* talk \w of|strong="H4428"\w* all \w Israel|strong="H4421"\w* \w was|strong="H0834"\w* \w come|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* house.)

\w You|strong="H3605"\w* \w are|strong="H3478"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* brethren, \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w are|strong="H3478"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* bone, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* flesh, \w why|strong="H4100"\w* \w are|strong="H3478"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w last|strong="H0314"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* \w back|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*?

\w And|strong="H4428"\w* say ye \w to|strong="H7725"\w* Amasa: Art \w not|strong="H1961"\w* thou \w my|strong="H1961"\w* \w bone|strong="H6106"\w*, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w my|strong="H1961"\w* \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w*? \w So|strong="H1961"\w* \w do|strong="H4100"\w* God \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w me|strong="H7725"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* add more, \w if|strong="H1961"\w* thou \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w not|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* chief captain \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* army before \w me|strong="H7725"\w* always \w in|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w place|strong="H1961"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Joab.

\w And|strong="H0430"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* inclined \w the|strong="H3605"\w* heart \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w men|strong="H3605"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* Juda, \w as|strong="H1961"\w* \w it|strong="H0518"\w* \w were|strong="H1961"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w one|strong="H3605"\w* \w man|strong="H3605"\w*: \w and|strong="H0430"\w* \w they|strong="H0518"\w* \w sent|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* king, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*: \w Return|strong="H8478"\w* thou, \w and|strong="H0430"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* thy servants.

\w And|strong="H3063"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w returned|strong="H7725"\w* \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w came|strong="H0413"\w* \w as|strong="H3824"\w* \w far|strong="H0413"\w* \w as|strong="H3824"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* Jordan, \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* Juda \w came|strong="H0413"\w* \w as|strong="H3824"\w* \w far|strong="H0413"\w* \w as|strong="H3824"\w* Galgal \w to|strong="H0413"\w* meet \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w bring|strong="H7725"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w* \w over|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* Jordan.

\w And|strong="H0935"\w* Semei \w the|strong="H0853"\w* son \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Gera \w the|strong="H0853"\w* son \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Jemini \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Bahurim, \w made|strong="H7725"\w* haste \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w went|strong="H0935"\w* down \w with|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* men \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Juda \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w meet|strong="H7125"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* David,

\w With|strong="H5973"\w* \w a|strong="H0834"\w* thousand \w men|strong="H0376"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Benjamin, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* Siba \w the|strong="H0834"\w* servant \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* house \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Saul: \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w his|strong="H1732"\w* fifteen \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* twenty \w servants|strong="H0376"\w* \w were|strong="H0834"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w him|strong="H5973"\w*: \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w going|strong="H3381"\w* \w over|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* Jordan,

\w They|strong="H0376"\w* passed \w the|strong="H6440"\w* fords \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, \w that|strong="H7586"\w* \w they|strong="H0376"\w* \w might|strong="H1121"\w* help \w over|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* \w household|strong="H1004"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* do \w according|strong="H0376"\w* \w to|strong="H0376"\w* \w his|strong="H0376"\w* commandment. \w And|strong="H1121"\w* Semei \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Gera falling \w down|strong="H6440"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, \w when|strong="H1121"\w* \w he|strong="H0376"\w* \w was|strong="H7586"\w* come \w over|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w*,

Said \w to|strong="H6440"\w* \w him|strong="H0853"\w*: Impute \w not|strong="H1121"\w* \w to|strong="H6440"\w* \w me|strong="H6440"\w*, \w my|strong="H6440"\w* lord, \w the|strong="H0853"\w* iniquity, nor remember \w the|strong="H0853"\w* injuries \w of|strong="H1121"\w* thy servant \w on|strong="H5307"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* day \w that|strong="H5307"\w* thou, \w my|strong="H6440"\w* lord, \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, wentest \w out|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Jerusalem, nor \w lay|strong="H5307"\w* \w it|strong="H6213"\w* \w up|strong="H0853"\w* \w in|strong="H1004"\w* thy heart, \w O|strong="H1004"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*.

\w For|strong="H0413"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* thy \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* acknowledge \w my|strong="H7760"\w* \w sin|strong="H5771"\w*: \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w therefore|strong="H0834"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* am \w come|strong="H3318"\w* \w this|strong="H0834"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w first|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w all|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* house \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Joseph|strong="H0413"\w*, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* am \w come|strong="H3318"\w* \w down|strong="H7760"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w meet|strong="H3318"\w* \w my|strong="H7760"\w* \w lord|strong="H0113"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*.

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* Abisai \w the|strong="H3605"\w* son \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Sarvia answering, said: \w Shall|strong="H1004"\w* Semei \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w these|strong="H3605"\w* words \w not|strong="H3588"\w* \w be|strong="H0113"\w* \w put|strong="H0935"\w* \w to|strong="H0935"\w* death, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* cursed \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord’s|strong="H0113"\w* anointed?

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* David \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: \w What|strong="H2063"\w* \w have|strong="H1121"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* do \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*, ye \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Sarvia? \w why|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H1121"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* satan \w this|strong="H2063"\w* day \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w me|strong="H4191"\w*? \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w there|strong="H3068"\w* \w any|strong="H3588"\w* \w man|strong="H1121"\w* \w be|strong="H4191"\w* \w killed|strong="H4191"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w* day \w in|strong="H3068"\w* Israel? do \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* know \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w* day \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w am|strong="H3068"\w* made king \w over|strong="H0853"\w* Israel?

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* Semei: Thou shalt \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w die|strong="H4191"\w*. \w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* swore unto \w him|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w And|strong="H4428"\w* Miphiboseth \w the|strong="H0559"\w* son \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Saul|strong="H0559"\w* \w came|strong="H0413"\w* down \w to|strong="H0413"\w* meet \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w he|strong="H3808"\w* \w had|strong="H4428"\w* \w neither|strong="H3808"\w* washed \w his|strong="H3808"\w* feet, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* trimmed \w his|strong="H3808"\w* beard: \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* washed \w his|strong="H3808"\w* garments \w from|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* day \w that|strong="H0559"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w went|strong="H0413"\w* \w out|strong="H0413"\w*, until \w the|strong="H0559"\w* day \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w his|strong="H3808"\w* return \w in|strong="H0413"\w* peace.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w when|strong="H3117"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w met|strong="H7125"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w at|strong="H3117"\w* Jerusalem, \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* said \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w him|strong="H0853"\w*: \w Why|strong="H0834"\w* camest thou \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w with|strong="H0935"\w* \w me|strong="H4480"\w*, Miphiboseth?

\w And|strong="H1980"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* answering, \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: \w My|strong="H1961"\w* lord, \w O|strong="H4100"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, \w my|strong="H1961"\w* servant despised \w me|strong="H0935"\w*: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* thy servant \w spoke|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w him|strong="H0935"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* saddle \w me|strong="H0935"\w* \w an|strong="H1961"\w* ass, \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* might \w get|strong="H1980"\w* \w on|strong="H1980"\w* \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w go|strong="H1980"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* thy servant \w am|strong="H1961"\w* lame.

Moreover \w he|strong="H3588"\w* hath \w also|strong="H4428"\w* accused \w me|strong="H5921"\w* thy \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* thee, \w my|strong="H5921"\w* \w lord|strong="H0113"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*: \w but|strong="H3588"\w* thou \w my|strong="H5921"\w* \w lord|strong="H0113"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* art \w as|strong="H3588"\w* \w an|strong="H3588"\w* angel \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w God|strong="H0559"\w*, do \w what|strong="H5921"\w* pleaseth thee.
